<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/schedule/executePixel"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Executes a Pixel expression in the scheduler context and returns the result.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"required":["pixel"],"type":"object","properties":{"pixel":{"type":"string","description":"Pixel expression to execute"}},"title":"ExecutePixelForm"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
